conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a massachusetts movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM

I think I've got just the right Massachusetts movie for you!

May I suggest "Hitch" (2005)? It's a fun, light-hearted rom-com that takes place in the summer of 1962 in Hollywood, but it also pays homage to Alfred Hitchcock, who was known for his work with Massachusetts-based film studios. And let me tell you, the cast is fantastic - Will Smith and Eva Mendes are great together!

If you're not in the mood for a rom-com, "The Seduction of Joe Tynan" (1979) might be up your alley! It's a thought-provoking drama that explores themes of morality, politics, and relationships, all set against the backdrop of Massachusetts.
